meanings.definition: More than is needed, desired, or required.
meanings.sent1: The extra decorations on the cake were superfluous.
meanings.sent2: Carrying an umbrella on a sunny day is superfluous.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a winter coat in the desert would be superfluous.
meanings.sent4: Her apologies felt as superfluous as a fifth wheel.
meanings.sent5: The unnecessary clutter in the room was as superfluous as a peacock in a henhouse.

meanings.sent1: The superfluous details in the report made it hard to read.
meanings.sent2: Buying another pair of shoes would be superfluous at this point.
meanings.sent3: Eating a whole cake by yourself might be considered superfluous.
meanings.sent4: His constant chatter was as superfluous as a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The extra buttons on the shirt seemed as superfluous as a third wheel on a bicycle.
